name: Paco-Baco_Mayhem
description:
(THIS IS A VERY EARLY VERSION FOR TESTING, THIS WILL BE SUBMITTED TO THE BULLET HELL GAME JAM)

Your owner Zazo is an engineer specialized in robotics, he tried to sell his robot idea to a company, he got rejected and his idea was stolen a week after

You are Paco, a robot built to unleash chaos on the office that stole your idea, destroy everything!
